title: The Dragon Rules: Part One
description: THE DRAGON RULES: PART ONEA Dragon Shifter Paranormal RomanceBy New York Times and USA Today Bestselling Author Michele BardsleyShe who tamed the beast of ClonakiltySlumbers beneath waters siltyMourn the Raven maiden one and allFor she caused the dragon's fallThe town burnedThe lesson learnedIf you wish to see the morrowNe'er speak of Kearney's sorrowWhen archaeologist Shannon Bram receives the coveted Kearney Grant to excavate on the family's ancient Irish lands, she's beyond elated. She has no idea why renowned recluse Aiden Kearney picked her out of the thousands of her more experienced peers.The moment she arrives at the infamous castle outside of Clonakilty, Shannon feels a sense of familiarity, not only with the town and the Kearney lands, but with the handsome and mysterious Aiden. She know wells the legend of the raging dragon, the beast tamed by a maiden meant to be his sacrifice.What she doesn't know is that dragons are real, and so is the legend. And Shannon is the key to a mystery eight-hundred-years-old--and a love that has never died.
author: Michele Bardsley
